body: @Camellia7 u here for the plot? At nhentai? Seriously? Only retarded ppl would actually expect plot in every hentai u see. Go read some manga if you want “plot”, fucking idiot.
this artist too repetitive , milf > netorare > gangbang > netorare > dark skin > repeat same plot, same dumb MC , same slut FMC, the art si really good, the plot always same like a trash
